subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard’s departure probably did not come as a surprise to anyone in the N.B.A. — except, perhaps, the Lakers, who do not lose marquee players but collect them.
snippet: Dwight Howard’s departure probably did not come as a surprise to anyone in the N.B.A. — except, perhaps, the Lakers, who do not lose marquee players but collect them.
